definition: saliva/sweat/a ferry crossing/a ford (river crossing)/abbr. for Tianjin 天津
to show sb how to get to the right path

sentences.english: This hand torch, Helios flew before, please him.
sentences.chinese: 这才手执火把，飞到赫利俄斯面前，请他指点迷津。

sentences.english: Get back to work. There's a team in the office in need of your guidance.
sentences.chinese: 回去工作，办公室里还有个团队等着你指点迷津呢。

sentences.english: They prayed to God for guidance.
sentences.chinese: 他们祈求上帝指点迷津。

sentences.english: Henceforth I will pray, but my cries for help will only be cries for guidance.
sentences.chinese: 从今往后，我要祈祷，但是我只求指点迷津。

sentences.english: Have you known someone who is always quick with a sharp word of condemnation?
sentences.chinese: 你是否见过一种人，他经常快言快语的爱指点迷津？

sentences.english: The beauty bosom friend is a kind of point to stir, ordering to stir your wrong path in the heart.
sentences.chinese: 红颜知己就是一种点拨，点拨你心中的迷津。

sentences.english: Failing that, let us be your guide.
sentences.chinese: 如果做不到这一点，让我们来为你指点迷津。

sentences.english: She was lost in the maze for several hours.
sentences.chinese: 她在迷津中迷失了好几个小时。

definition: to show sb how to get to the right path
to dispel doubts/to clear up confusion
magic transformation performed by Daoist immortal/fig. to reveal/to enlighten
lit. sea of bitterness/abyss of worldly suffering (Buddhist term)/depths of misery
to go astray and to not know how to get back on the right path (idiom)
poor monk (humble term used by monk of himself)
to achieve the Dao/to become an immortal
